title: Casino Night Fundraiser in Dallas (Justin Atkinson)
text: By Justin Atkinson Oct 21, 2015 Are you hosting a casino night fundraiser in Dallas Fort Worth and looking for the right casino party company to help you plan a successful event? Casino Nights of Texas has all of the equipment and expertise you need to plan and host a successful casino theme party! Casino Nights understands how important your casino night fundraiser in Dallas Fort Worth can be for your organization's or project's annual donations and yearly budget. From the planning, to the day of delivery, to the ambiance of the night of the fundraiser, Casino Nights has everything you need meet your event expectations and to entertain your guests with fun and vibrant adult entertainment.Casino Nights provides the casino table rentals, casino equipment rentals and casino party dealers all in convenient party packages that include delivery and setup and can be adjusted to fit your specific casino night fundraiser in Dallas Fort Worth. Casino table rentals can include poker tables, blackjack tables, craps tables, roulette tables, and slot machines. Casino equipment rentals could include items such as seating, cards, dice, chips, funny money, and raffle tickets.And with Casino Nights' fun and entertaining casino party dealers, your guests will both be easily guided through how to play each game and will have plenty of laughs and smiles with their favorite dealer personalities. With a casino night fundraiser in Dallas, Fort Worth or surrounding north Texas area, it is all about the ambiance and energy of the event, so let Casino Nights boost that energy with fun casino party dealers that bring the party to life.So, what better way to get your guests, patrons and donors in a giving mood than enjoying a night of winning at the tables. Loosen up those inhibitions of spending by priming your donors with games that promote the ideas of "easy come easy go", and "it's only money and there'll always be more". Give your guests a round of funny money at registration to buy chips at the tables, then let them cash in their winnings for raffle tickets to win door prizes. Everyone loves taking home the night's spoils from a casino night fundraiser! Rating:
